name: phaser3-typescript
description: Boilerplate, Game Examples, Cheat Sheets and Tutorials for Phaser 3 in TypeScript

scripts.boilerplate: cd src/boilerplate && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.alpha-adjust: cd src/games/alpha-adjust && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.asteroid: cd src/games/asteroid && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.blockade: cd src/games/blockade && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.candy-crush: cd src/games/candy-crush && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.coin-runner: cd src/games/coin-runner && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.flappy-bird: cd src/games/flappy-bird && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.cellular-automaton: cd src/experimental/cellular-automaton && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.fractal-tree: cd src/experimental/fractal-tree && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.game-of-life: cd src/experimental/game-of-life && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.lissajous-curve: cd src/experimental/lissajous-curve && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.point-in-polygon: cd src/experimental/point-in-polygon && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.procedural-generation: cd src/experimental/procedural-generation && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.raycasting: cd src/experimental/raycasting && yarn && yarn run dev
scripts.untextured-raycaster: cd src/experimental/untextured-raycaster && yarn && yarn run dev
